service_name: Platform as a Service (PaaS) (Cloud Hosted in UK Data Centres)
page_content:
Capgemini UK plc

Platform as a Service (PaaS) (Cloud Hosted in UK Data Centres)

Capgemini will provide a Platform as a Service (“PaaS”) managed cloud service leveraging our Infrastructure as a Service (“IaaS”) platform which enables Capgemini to provision and scale Virtual Machines (“VM”s) in minutes, in a flexible and autonomous manner

Features

  • On Demand Infrastructure with 24x7 Infrastructure and Customer support.
  • Enterprise class, secure, highly available, resilient and redundant infrastructure
  • Dedicated cloud resources that segregates compute and storage
  • Provides high compliance and certification requirements
  • Dedicated multi-tiered storage on redundant, high-performance
  • Dedicated firewall management features
  • OS Management Services (OS includes Windows, RHEL and SUSE)
  • Anti-Virus deployment across all of the Customers Servers
  • Monitoring of OS, Application and Databases
  • Backup capabilities and dual site failover capability

Benefits

  • Can speed up operational management
  • ITIL best practice – can significantly reduce issues and errors
  • Can match business needs through scalable infrastructure resources/ costs
  • VMs patched to the agreed security level can give confidence
  • Capgemini’s award-winning UK datacentres give market leading Green IT
  • Assured Security –platform is Pan Government Accredited

Pricing

£156.16 per virtual machine per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month

Certifications

Certifications
Name Content
Vendor certification(s)
  • Tier III Primary Data Centre certified by Uptime Institute
  • Tier III Seconday Data Centre assessed by HurleyPalmerFlatt design consultants
  • ISO270001 certified by BSi Management Systems for both Data Centres
  • ISO14001 certified by DNV for both Data Centres
  • EU Code of Conduct for Data Centres for both Data Centres
  • List X Secondary Data Centre
  • Power Utilisation Effectiveness 1.08 for Primary Data Centre
  • Power Utilisation Effectiveness 1.8 for Seconday Data Centre
  • Government Security Classification OFFICIAL (PGA IL3) for both Data Centres
